name: .KKSRC
summary: Learn about .KKSRC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open and edit a KKSRC file with Kate Editor (multiplatform), Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform), or any other text editor. Doing so allows you to customize the keyboard shortcuts the file contains.
To use a KKSRC file with KDE Plasma, either import the file in the Global Shortcuts section of System Settings or use the following command to change your current keyboard shortcut scheme:

images.alt: Screenshot of a .kksrc file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: KKSRC file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
